## Graph Slide

```{r load-data}
library(ggplot2)
data(diamonds)
```

```{r hist, message=FALSE, fig.align='c enter'}

possible <- names(diamonds)[sapply(diamonds, is.numeric)]

selectInput(
  inputId = "selCol",
  label = "Choose a column",
  choices = possible
)
renderPlot(
  ggplot(diamonds, aes_string(x = input$selCol)) +
    geom_histogram()
)
```

<div class="notes">
- Histogram of diamond prices
